description: Pope Francis responded to questions about a claim by a former Vatican ambassador that he helped cover up abuse allegations against Cardinal Theodore McCarrick in 2013.
title: Pope on Cover-up Allegations: ‘I Will Not Say One Word on This’
title_page: Pope on Cover-up Allegations: ‘I Will Not Say One Word on This’ - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Pope Francis responded to questions about a claim by a former Vatican ambassador that he helped cover up abuse allegations against Cardinal Theodore McCarrick in 2013.
